entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is described as the one who has his tongue stuck out of his mouth and is gagging and sputtering. He is also referred to as 'the foot-long thing' in Harry's realization.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as the one who realizes that the foot-long thing is Dudley's tongue. He is also present at the scene and reacts to the situation.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is described as the one who hurries to help Dudley and attempts to wrench his tongue out of his mouth. She is also referred to as 'bellowing' and 'screaming worse than ever'.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is described as the one who is bellowing and waving his arms around. He is also present at the scene and reacts to the situation.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is described as the one who tries to help Dudley by shouting and advancing on him with his wand outstretched. He is also referred to as 'ha[d] to shout to make himself heard' due to the commotion.

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley tries to help Dudley by shouting and advancing on him with his wand outstretched.
Aunt Petunia hurries to help Dudley and attempts to wrench his tongue out of his mouth.
Harry realizes that the foot-long thing is Dudley's tongue.
